title: 38. Makeover your home on a budget with special guest Andrea from Pine and Prospect Home
description:
It doesn't have to cost a lot to make your home beautiful. With a lot of hard work, a keen eye and most importantly PATIENCE you can transform any space. Join me this week as I talk with Andrea from Pine and Prospect Home about thrifting for your home. 

Follow along with Pine and Prospect Home:

The blog

The YouTube Channel 

Instagram

Grab my Ebook recently updated with ALL of my sourdough recipes HERE!

Get my free 10 day course on how to start a blog HERE.

Thanks again for listening and I'll see you in the next episode of the Simple Farmhouse Life podcast!
dc:creator: Lisa Bass
